column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////5. Servers MUST do at least a visual check (make direct eye contact
column2: if not verbal contact) within 3 minutes of our entrees being served.  This is the 3 most important minutes of the entire meal!  If my food is over/undercooked
column4: if I need more salad dressing
column5: or want another glass of wine WITH my meal
column6: etc. - NOW is the time for those requests to be handled ASAP.  MOST restaurants in Chicago fail at this basic point of service
